Hey all, I'm new to this group, but I've been a fan of Gladiator for several
years now. I'm not a C++ programmer (Only VB), so I can't help in that
section, but I'm pretty good at drawing graphics and the like, so if there
is anything that could use drawing, gimmie a ring.

From: <bluedrgnkid@...>
To: <gladiator@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2002 2:09 PM
Subject: Re: [gladiator] Re: Gladiator source


> Hey, i have a idea. After this, why not try helping with Gladiator: Beyond

might
